publ: by 深圳市铭视通科技有限公司
name: ElemageCam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
elemage skill can only be used for certain WiFi cameras. Not all cameras using the elemage app will support elemage skill. So please check with the seller before using this skill to see if your product supports Alexa.

In order to get a better experience for funny alexa operation,please read follow details to start:

1. Download the elemage application from the App Store or Google Play, then connect the camera to the elemage app, and keep it online and running.
2. Find elemage Skill in the Alexa application, click 'Enable Skills' to link your camera to your Alexa account, and then locate your camera.
3. when you finished above steps,you can go on your alexa journey to find more fun: 
try voice commands like 'Alexa, Show Living Room' to obtain real-time videos and monitor everything in your home.
try voice commands like 'Alexa, Show me parking lot' to see your car.
try voice commands like 'Alexa, Show me entrance' to see your package.
4. Please feel free to contact us once you have any problems in operation.
